gui.wizardstaff.bee_magic.description: Use your magic to force bees out of their hive.
gui.wizardstaff.bee_magic.name: Evacuate Hive
gui.wizardstaff.blaze_powder_magic.name: Flame Thrower
gui.wizardstaff.blue_dye_magic.name: Weather Controller
gui.wizardstaff.bookshelf_magic.name: %s Generator
gui.wizardstaff.bricks_magic.description: Surround yourself by magic bricks, creating a safe space.
gui.wizardstaff.bricks_magic.name: Portable Wall
gui.wizardstaff.bucket_magic.description: Use magic to replicate the usage of a %s.
gui.wizardstaff.bucket_magic.name: Magic %s
gui.wizardstaff.builder_magic.descriptio: Use the magic of the staff to construct a '%s' building in a flash of an eye.
gui.wizardstaff.builder_magic.name: Build '%s'
gui.wizardstaff.carved_pumpkin_magic.des: Create a large slow moving shadow that damages and weakens everything it touches.
gui.wizardstaff.clock_magic.name: Time Dilation
gui.wizardstaff.cobweb_magic.name: Spider Web
gui.wizardstaff.deage_magic.description: Shoot a de-age ray at an entity, turning it into a child.
gui.wizardstaff.deage_magic.name: Deage Magic
gui.wizardstaff.deflect_projectile_magic: Use your staff as a protective layer around you, deflecting projectiles.
gui.wizardstaff.egg_magic.description: Shoot a purple ray of magic at entities, trapping them inside an egg.
gui.wizardstaff.egg_magic.name: Eggization
gui.wizardstaff.elytra_magic.description: Rotate your staff quickly enough to lift from the ground.
gui.wizardstaff.elytra_magic.name: Magic Helicopter
gui.wizardstaff.ender_chest_magic.descri: Use your staff to give you remote access to your ender storage.
gui.wizardstaff.ender_chest_magic.name: Portable Ender Chest
gui.wizardstaff.feather_magic.descriptio: Use magic to dampen the effects of gravity, slowing your fall.
gui.wizardstaff.feather_magic.name: Slow Fall
gui.wizardstaff.force_entity_magic.name: %s %s
gui.wizardstaff.ghast_tear_magic.descrip: Use magic to enhance your crying, immediately extinguishing flames from you.
gui.wizardstaff.ghast_tear_magic.name: Fire Immunity
gui.wizardstaff.gold_nugget_magic.descri: Use magic compel nearby Piglins to give you their items.
gui.wizardstaff.gold_nugget_magic.name: Magic Bartering
gui.wizardstaff.grappling_hook_magic.des: Use the staff as a grappling hook.
gui.wizardstaff.haste_magic.name: Work Ethic
gui.wizardstaff.infest_stone_magic.name: Infest %s
gui.wizardstaff.inventory_magic.name: Portable Chest
gui.wizardstaff.jukebox_magic.descriptio: Emit an irresistible tune from the staff, forcing enemies within %s blocks to dance.
gui.wizardstaff.jukebox_magic.name: Magic Music
gui.wizardstaff.light_magic.description: Conjure an invisible light source that disappears after a while.
gui.wizardstaff.light_magic.name: Let there be light
gui.wizardstaff.locate_spawn_magic.descr: Channel your inner powers to gain a sense of which direction your spawn point lies.
gui.wizardstaff.locate_spawn_magic.name: Magic Compass
gui.wizardstaff.lodestone_magic.descript: Right click a %s block with the staff, setting your waypoint to that block. Then, activating the staff anywhere in the world will return you to the waypoint, consuming the block in the process.
gui.wizardstaff.lodestone_magic.name: Magical Translocator
gui.wizardstaff.map_magic.description: Transform the item in the staff into a treasure map.
gui.wizardstaff.map_magic.name: Treasure Map!
gui.wizardstaff.mass_harvest_magic.descr: Use your magic to harvest up to %s adjacent %s.
gui.wizardstaff.mass_harvest_magic.name: Mass Harvest %s
gui.wizardstaff.mining_magic.description: Use your magic to harvest up to %s nearby %s and put the loot immediately in your inventory. Benefits from enchantments.
gui.wizardstaff.mining_magic.name: Magic Mining
gui.wizardstaff.mount_magic.description: Use your magic to make it possible to ride certain entities. While riding you can use this spell to steer the entity.
gui.wizardstaff.mount_magic.name: Ride %s
gui.wizardstaff.mushroom_cloud_magic.des: Create a magic poison cloud in from of you, damaging anyone that enters it, slowly turning them into mushrooms.
gui.wizardstaff.name_tag_magic.descripti: Conjure a name tag with a random name.
gui.wizardstaff.name_tag_magic.name: Random Name Generator
gui.wizardstaff.nether_brick_magic.descr: Use your magic to sense the direction of the nearest Nether Fortress.
gui.wizardstaff.nether_brick_magic.name: Fortress Locator
gui.wizardstaff.netherrack_magic.descrip: Like Frost Walker but for lava, simple as that.
gui.wizardstaff.netherrack_magic.name: Walk on Lava
gui.wizardstaff.no_magic.name: No Magic
gui.wizardstaff.obsidian_magic.descripti: Open a portal to the dimension '%s'. WARNING: One way only!
gui.wizardstaff.obsidian_magic.name: Portal to '%s'
gui.wizardstaff.pillar_magic.description: Stand still and use the staff to automatically propel yourself upwards, while creating a %s tower below you.
gui.wizardstaff.pillar_magic.name: %s Pillar
Channel your magic to access a full 3x3 crafting table.
gui.wizardstaff.potion_magic.name: Potion: %s %s
gui.wizardstaff.projectile_magic.descrip: Conjure and fire a %s in front of you.
gui.wizardstaff.projectile_magic.name: Launch %s
gui.wizardstaff.push_block_magic.descrip: Use your magic to push %s blocks.
gui.wizardstaff.push_block_magic.name: %s Mover
gui.wizardstaff.push_button_magic.descri: Activate buttons from a large distance.
gui.wizardstaff.push_button_magic.name: Long Range Button Pushing
gui.wizardstaff.remove_fluid_magic.descr: Use your magic to remove fluid of type '%s' around you.
gui.wizardstaff.remove_fluid_magic.name: Fluid Remover: '%s'
gui.wizardstaff.repair_armor_magic.descr: Use magic to repair the armor you are wearing.
gui.wizardstaff.repair_armor_magic.name: Repair Armor
gui.wizardstaff.repair_offhand_magic.des: Channel your magical powers to slowly repair the item held in your other hand.
gui.wizardstaff.revert_position_magic.de: Revert your position to where you were five seconds ago.
gui.wizardstaff.shaped_create_entity_mag: Summon a number of %s entities in a special shape around the player.
gui.wizardstaff.shulker_bullet_magic.des: Use magic to replicate a shulker bullet, targeting a nearby entity.
gui.wizardstaff.smelting_magic.descripti: Magical item processing, replicating the functionality of the %s.
gui.wizardstaff.smelting_magic.name: Magical %s
gui.wizardstaff.soul_sand_magic.descript: Summon skeletal hands from the ground in front of your, damaging and slowing entities they touch.
gui.wizardstaff.soul_sand_magic.name: InteractionHands from Below
gui.wizardstaff.summon_entity_magic.desc: Use your magic to summon %s %s entities.
gui.wizardstaff.summon_entity_magic.name: Summon %s
gui.wizardstaff.summon_lightning_magic.d: Magically summon a lightning strike at your position!
gui.wizardstaff.surface_magic.descriptio: Click on two blocks in the world with the staff, and then use the staff to automatically build a surface between those two blocks. Only works for axis-aligned surfaces, so no diagonals! It will build the surface using blocks from your inventory, of the same type as the block you clicked first. Costs experience based on amount of blocks placed.
gui.wizardstaff.surface_magic.name: Magic Surface Builder
gui.wizardstaff.swap_health_food_magic.d: Magically swap your health and hunger.
gui.wizardstaff.swap_position_magic.desc: Shoot a teleportation ray at an entity, swapping place with it.
gui.wizardstaff.swap_position_magic.name: Swap Position
gui.wizardstaff.swap_trade_magic.descrip: Use your magic to compel a villager to swap the buy and sell item of trades. The swapped trades are put on cooldown in the process. Some trades can not be swapped.
gui.wizardstaff.swap_trade_magic.name: Swap Trades
gui.wizardstaff.tnt_magic.name: T.N.T.
gui.wizardstaff.transform_entity_magic.d: Shot a transformation ray that turns %s entities into %s entities.
gui.wizardstaff.transmutation_magic.desc: Transmutate the item in the staff into the item %s.
gui.wizardstaff.transmutation_magic.name: Conjure %s
gui.wizardstaff.wall_climb_magic.name: Wall Climbing
gui.wizardstaff.wizard_staff_magic.name: Staff-ception
gui.wizardstaff.writable_book_magic.name: Arcane Knowledge
gui.wizardstaff.x_ray_magic.description: Magically locate blocks of type %s in a range of %s blocks. Note that it might take a while for all blocks to be discovered.
gui.wizardstaff.x_ray_magic.name: X-Ray %s
gui.wizardstaff.zoom_magic.name: Super Zoom
